description: Numbers n such that maximal value of prime divisors of reduced residue system for n is 2.
example: n=29 is here because for terms of RRS[ 29 ]={1,2,...,27,28} the number of prime divisors is 0(for 1), 1(for prime powers) or 2 (for 6,10,12,14,15,18,20,21,22,24,26,28).
author: _Labos Elemer_
